nodes.definition: A recursive unit of organization that functions simultaneously as an autonomous whole and as a dependent part of a larger aggregate (a Holarchy). It possesses a Markov Blanket separating internal state from external states, interacting only through active outputs and sensory inputs.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as the `Holon` trait in `crates/apm2-holon/src/traits.rs`, defining the agent contract (`intake`, `execute_episode`, `should_stop`). The `EpisodeController` in `crates/apm2-holon/src/episode/controller.rs` manages the execution loop, enforcing the Markov Blanket via `EpisodeContext`.

nodes.definition: A time-bounded, scope-bounded, revocable authorization to perform work or access resources. It serves as the primary mechanism for Bounded Authority.
nodes.operationalization: Represented by the `Lease` struct (`crates/apm2-holon/src/resource/lease.rs`) containing `LeaseScope` and `expiration`. Enforced by the `LeaseValidator` trait in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/dispatch.rs` during tool execution.

nodes.definition: A quantified allowance of resources (Compute, Tokens, Time, Tool Calls) attached to a Lease. It enforces hard stops to prevent runaway agents.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as the `EpisodeBudget` struct in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/budget.rs` with 4D limits (tokens, time, actions, episodes). Checked by `EpisodeController` during execution cycles.

nodes.definition: A Holonic Verification Protocol that enforces quality, security, and compliance standards. It transforms subjective reviews into objective, machine-verifiable proofs (Receipts).
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `CapabilityGate` (`crates/apm2-core/src/cac/capability_gate.rs`) and `GateReceiptGenerator`. Verifies `EvidenceBundle` against `GateRequirements` (`crates/apm2-core/src/evidence/receipt.rs`).

nodes.definition: A specialized Gate that controls the entry of ChangeSets into the Forge. It ensures that only work meeting strict criteria (e.g., passing AAT, no security regressions) is admitted for merging.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `AdmissionGate` in `crates/apm2-core/src/cac/admission.rs`. Generates `AdmissionReceipt` upon success.

nodes.definition: The Topology of Truth. An append-only, cryptographically verifiable log of all significant events. It serves as the single source of truth for the system state.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as a SQLite WAL store via `Ledger` struct (`crates/apm2-core/src/ledger/storage.rs`) storing hash-chained `EventRecord`s. Provides a `LedgerReader` for concurrent access and `LedgerBackend` trait for abstraction.

nodes.definition: The atomic unit of storage in the Ledger. Contains the event payload, sequence ID, and cryptographic proofs.
nodes.operationalization: Defined as `EventRecord` struct in `crates/apm2-core/src/ledger/storage.rs`, containing `seq_id`, `event_hash`, `prev_hash`, `signature`, and the serialized event payload.

nodes.definition: A Bounded Context Window of execution for a Holon. It represents a discrete unit of work (perceive-reason-act-evaluate) within a strictly enforced resource budget.
nodes.operationalization: Managed by `EpisodeController` (`crates/apm2-holon/src/episode/controller.rs`) and `EpisodeRuntime` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/runtime.rs`). Lifecycle events like `EpisodeStarted` are emitted to the ledger.

nodes.definition: A pre-compiled, content-addressed, and bounded view of artifacts required for execution. It enforces Context Discipline by serving as a read allowlist.
nodes.operationalization: Defined by `ContextPackSpec` (`crates/apm2-core/src/cac/pack_spec.rs`) and `ContextPackManifest`. The `ContextPackCompiler` resolves dependencies into a deterministic view.

nodes.definition: A security model where authority is represented by unforgeable tokens (capabilities). It eliminates ambient authority by requiring explicit capability presentation.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented via `Capability` structs (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/capability.rs`) and `CapabilityManifest`. The `CapabilityValidator` ensures tools are only invoked with valid capabilities.

nodes.definition: A Cryptographic Proof of Work capturing immutable output. It consists of a CAS artifact and signed metadata linking it to a Work item.
nodes.operationalization: Represented by `Evidence` struct (`crates/apm2-core/src/evidence/state.rs`) and categorized by `EvidenceCategory`. Stored in CAS and referenced by `EvidencePublished` events.

nodes.definition: A machine-verifiable proof of an outcome (e.g., Gate Pass, Tool Execution). It binds authority/validity to specific evidence.
nodes.operationalization: Gate receipts are implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/evidence/receipt.rs` and signed via `ReceiptSigner`. Tool receipts are represented in daemon protocol bindings. SummaryReceipt is a digest-first receipt form defined by schema (`schemas/apm2/summary_receipt.schema.json`) and is aspirational until fully wired through the ledger + CAS + verification stack.

nodes.definition: A receipt that compresses a larger body of work/evidence into a verifiable, digest-first summary with declared loss profile and zoom-in selectors.
nodes.operationalization: Schema-defined at `schemas/apm2/summary_receipt.schema.json`. A SummaryReceipt MUST bind to a ledger commitment and provide selectors/hashes to retrieve omitted evidence under delegated capability.

nodes.definition: A directed acyclic graph (DAG) of WorkIDs representing decomposition: nodes are work items and edges encode dependency/parentage (e.g., parent_work_ids). It is the structured coordination fabric that allows parallelism without shared-context flooding.
nodes.operationalization: Realized by `parent_work_ids` on Work objects/events and by deterministic projections in the core work reducer (`crates/apm2-core/src/work`).

nodes.definition: A proof that a ChangeSet was successfully merged into the canonical branch. It serves as the authoritative record of code evolution, binding the specific Commit ID to the approved ChangeSet.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `MergeReceipt` in `crates/apm2-core/src/fac/merge_receipt.rs`. Recorded on the ledger as a `MergeReceipt` event.

nodes.definition: A proof that a human or automated reviewer has approved a ChangeSet. It captures the reviewer's identity, the specific artifacts reviewed, and the verdict.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `ReviewReceiptRecorded` in `crates/apm2-core/src/fac/review_receipt.rs`. Includes a `ReviewReceiptRecordedBuilder` for construction.

nodes.definition: A rigorous, machine-driven verification process where ChangeSets are subjected to a defined `AatSpec` (suite of tests) to produce an `AatGateReceipt`.
nodes.operationalization: Defined by `AatSpec` (`crates/apm2-core/src/fac/aat_spec.rs`) and produced as `AatGateReceipt` (`crates/apm2-core/src/fac/aat_receipt.rs`).

nodes.definition: A discrete, privileged capability exposed to agents. It is the only mechanism for affecting the outside world, mediated by Policy and Leases.
nodes.operationalization: Defined via Protocol Buffers in `crates/apm2-core/src/tool/apm2.tool.v1.rs`. Handled by `ToolHandler` implementations in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/tool_handler.rs`, which enforce policy checks.

nodes.definition: A content-addressed representation of local, uncommitted changes relative to a pinned base state. Allows dirty state to be auditable.
nodes.operationalization: Modeled as a patch artifact managed by `WorkspaceManager` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/workspace.rs`). Used in `ContextPack`s for dirty execution.

nodes.definition: The atomic unit of code evolution. Represents a proposed transition strictly bound to a Plan and validated by Gates.
nodes.operationalization: A `Work` item type (`WorkType::ChangeSet`). Tracks the lifecycle of a code change on the ledger via `ChangeSetBundleV1` (`crates/apm2-core/src/fac/changeset_bundle.rs`).

nodes.definition: A specialized agent role responsible for Work Decomposition and Delegation. Manages the lifecycle of complex goals by spawning sub-holons.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented via `RestartCoordinator` (`crates/apm2-core/src/session/restart_coordinator.rs`) and specific `Holon` logic that delegates work via `EpisodeController`.

nodes.definition: The APM2 Kernel. Manages state, enforces policy, and orchestrates the IPC protocol between agents and the environment.
nodes.operationalization: The `apm2-daemon` crate. Holds `DaemonState` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/state.rs`) and runs the `SessionDispatcher` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/session_dispatch.rs`) to handle IPC.

nodes.definition: A Structured Defect. A typed data object representing a specific issue (Security, Lint) detected by a Gate.
nodes.operationalization: Struct with Category, Severity, Location, and a `FindingSignature` (`crates/apm2-core/src/fac/echo_trap.rs`) for recurrence tracking.

nodes.definition: The intent structure preceding a ChangeSet. Captures requirements and design decisions, hashed to prevent drift.
nodes.operationalization: A `Work` item (`WorkType::PrdRefinement`) producing a spec snapshot hash (`crates/apm2-core/src/work/state.rs`).

nodes.definition: Governance as Code. A system of rules enforcing Default-Deny constraints on agent behavior (Tools, Network, Filesystem).
nodes.operationalization: Enforced by `PolicyEngine` (`crates/apm2-core/src/policy/engine.rs`) using `PolicyDocument` (`crates/apm2-core/src/policy/schema.rs`) definitions.

nodes.definition: The OS-level execution unit of a Holon. Managed by a Supervisor and governed by a ProcessSpec.
nodes.operationalization: Managed via `ProcessHandle` and configured by `ProcessSpec` in `crates/apm2-core/src/process/mod.rs`.

nodes.definition: A pure function that transitions state by applying an Event. Ensures determinism and auditability.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as the `Reducer` trait (`crates/apm2-core/src/reducer/traits.rs`). Used to rebuild state from the Ledger. Can be checkpointed via `CheckpointStore` (`crates/apm2-core/src/reducer/checkpoint.rs`).

nodes.definition: A mechanism to save snapshots of Reducer state to avoid replaying the entire ledger from genesis.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `CheckpointStore` struct in `crates/apm2-core/src/reducer/checkpoint.rs`.

nodes.definition: The Temporal Continuity of an agent's work. Spans episodes and restarts, maintained via SessionState and Ledger replay.
nodes.operationalization: Tracked by `SessionState` (`crates/apm2-core/src/session/state.rs`). Recoverable via `RestartCoordinator`. Managed by `SessionDispatcher`.

nodes.definition: The central component in the Daemon that routes IPC messages to the appropriate Session implementation.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `SessionDispatcher` in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/session_dispatch.rs`.

nodes.definition: A verified, canonical projection of the Ledger at a specific anchor. Reduces replay cost while preserving provenance.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `SessionSnapshot` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/episode/handle.rs`) or `WorkspaceSnapshot`.

nodes.definition: An infrastructure role managing Lifecycle, Budget Enforcement, and Recovery. Acts as the OS for Holons.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented by `Supervisor` struct (`crates/apm2-core/src/supervisor/mod.rs`). Manages process handles and enforces leases.

nodes.definition: A non-authoritative Pulse Plane for lossy event notifications, designed to accelerate UX and reduce polling by deriving 'pulses' from the authoritative Truth Plane (Ledger + CAS).
nodes.operationalization: Implemented via `PulseEnvelopeV1` (proto), `PulsePublisher` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/pulse_outbox.rs`), and resource governance logic (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/resource_governance.rs`).

nodes.definition: The protocol substrate defining the time model for APM2. It prohibits wall-clock authority in favor of explicit, verifiable clocks (LedgerTime, MonotonicTicks, CausalTime).
nodes.operationalization: Implemented via `HtfTick` and `LedgerTime` (`crates/apm2-core/src/htf/types.rs`), `HolonicClock` (`crates/apm2-daemon/src/htf/clock.rs`), and `TimeEnvelope`.

nodes.definition: A clock that combines physical time with logical ticks to capture causality across distributed systems.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/htf/types.rs` and `crates/apm2-daemon/src/htf/clock.rs`.

nodes.definition: The cryptographic identity of an agent or component, typically a hash of a verifying key.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/projection/divergence_watchdog.rs`.

nodes.definition: The atomic unit of work request/initiation, typically upstream of a Plan. Represents the "Spec-of-Request".
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/ticket_emitter/emitter.rs`.

nodes.definition: The agent-side stateful representation of a unit of work (ticket, plan, changeset) tracking its lifecycle attempts.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-holon/src/work.rs`.

nodes.definition: A node or mechanism that mediates connectivity between Holons to enforce outbound-only security boundaries.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/consensus/relay.rs`.

nodes.definition: The mandatory protocol negotiation (Hello/HelloAck) required before any IPC or network exchange.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/handshake.rs`.

nodes.definition: A calculated artifact that determines the "Blast Radius" of a change, used to assign Risk Tiers.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/impact_map`.

nodes.definition: The authoritative store for Protocol Buffer schemas and version mappings, enforcing semantic typing.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/schema_registry`.

nodes.definition: A subsystem that monitors codebase complexity and churn to generate proactive maintenance recommendations (Refactoring Tickets).
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/refactor_radar`.

nodes.definition: Data structures that guarantee eventual convergence without global synchronization, used for the Data Plane.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented in `crates/apm2-core/src/consensus/crdt.rs`.

nodes.definition: A machine-readable counterexample that falsifies an intent predicate or contract. It includes an evidence bundle, structured findings, and replay instructions.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `DefectRecord` in `crates/apm2-holon/src/defect.rs` and the `DefectRecorded` event in `events/apm2.kernel.v1.rs`.

nodes.definition: A deterministic identifier computed from normalized finding fields (category, rule ID, subsystem, location) used to cluster recurrent defects and trigger countermeasures.
nodes.operationalization: Implemented as `FindingSignature` in `crates/apm2-core/src/fac/echo_trap.rs`.

nodes.definition: The authoritative coordination plane comprising work-object specs, durable event records, and deterministic projections. It is the 'factory floor' for agent activity.
nodes.operationalization: Abstract concept realized by the integration of `Ledger`, `CAS`, `WorkObject` state machines, and the `Daemon` event loop.

nodes.definition: An approved Plan specification snapshot bound by a content digest. It serves as the immutable reference for downstream implementation and verification.
nodes.operationalization: Realized as a `Work` object with `WorkType::PrdRefinement` or `RfcRefinement` that has been approved and hashed.

nodes.definition: A deterministic representation of specification content (YAML, attachments, schema versions), canonicalized and hashed to provide stable identity.
nodes.operationalization: Part of the `Work` state in `crates/apm2-core/src/work/state.rs`, stored as `spec_snapshot_hash`.

nodes.definition: An execution instance of a Gate against a Plan or ChangeSet, producing a decision and a bounded set of Findings. It must emit a verifiable receipt.
nodes.operationalization: Represented by the `GateRunCompleted` event in `documents/rfcs/RFC-0015/06_ticket_decomposition.yaml` (and likely protocol definitions).

nodes.definition: Planned work to prevent the recurrence of a FindingSignature by modifying system guardrails. Validated by evidence of reduced recurrence.
nodes.operationalization: A specific `WorkType` (conceptual) or a `Ticket` triggered by recurrence analysis in `RefactorRadar` or similar subsystems.

nodes.definition: The only legal path for capabilities to cross a holonic boundary. It grants a narrowly-scoped capability set with TTL and audit bindings.
nodes.operationalization: Conceptual mechanism defined in `unified_theory.json` (MECH-PERMEABILITY-RECEIPT). Implemented as part of the handshake/capability exchange protocol.

nodes.definition: An explicit escalation event for high-entropy specification gaps or irreducible human decisions. Treated as a refinement input, not a silent failure.
nodes.operationalization: Conceptual mechanism defined in `unified_theory.json` (MECH-ORACLE-REQUEST).

nodes.definition: The digest-first communication standard for inter-holon messages. It enforces `Discovery -> Handshake -> Work -> Evidence` progression, with a low-bandwidth signed Governance channel for stop orders and policy/contract updates.
nodes.operationalization: Conceptual standard defined in `unified_theory.json` (MECH-HOLON-MESH-PROTOCOL). Partially implemented by the `apm2-daemon` protocol.

nodes.definition: An operational and trust boundary that hosts a set of holons with a local ledger namespace, CAS, and policy. It supports federation via anti-entropy.
nodes.operationalization: Conceptual unit of sharding defined in `unified_theory.json` (Federation Model).
